articles.author: ADAM NAGOURNEY
articles.title: Dana Rohrabacher Loses, Eroding Republican Foothold in California
articles.description: Mr. Rohrabacher, who had represented Orange County for 15 terms, was viewed as vulnerable because of his advocacy of President Vladimir Putin of Russia.
articles.content: Representative Dana Rohrabacher, a Republican fixture in California who represented Orange County for 15 terms, lost his bid for re-election. His defeat underlines the partys setbacks in a part of the state that was long a symbol of its political dominance. T… [+806 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Calls for Open Trade to Greet Pence as Trump Skips Asia Summit
articles.description: Asia-Pacific leaders will join the heads of Southeast Asian states this week in Singapore to renew calls for multilateralism and fresh pledges to resolve regional conflicts ranging from the Rohingya crisis in Myanmar to tensions in the South China Sea.
articles.content: It was not clear if Li and Pence will hold separate talks on the sidelines of the Singapore meetings, which would be a prelude to a summit scheduled between Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping at the end of the month in Buenos Aires. The encounter, if it h… [+1243 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Argentine Recession Seen Bottoming Out in First Quarter: IMF
articles.description: Argentina's shrinking economy will bottom out in the first three months of next year and start to recover in the second quarter, an International Monetary Fund official said on Saturday.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES Argentina's shrinking economy will bottom out in the first three months of next year and start to recover in the second quarter, an International Monetary Fund official said on Saturday. The fund last month upped the size of its standby financing… [+640 chars]

articles.author: RICHARD GOLDSTEIN
articles.title: Ron Johnson, Giants Running Back, Dies at 71
articles.description: Johnson twice rushed for more than 1,000 yards in the 1970s, when the Giants struggled to win. He is tied for the team record of four touchdowns in a game.
articles.content: For all his achievements in six seasons with the Giants, Johnson was hampered by injuries, and the team did not win so much as a division title. Id like to go anywhere to play for a winner, he told The Sarasota Herald Tribune in January 1975. The Giants did n… [+899 chars]

articles.description: Ballots were being counted at the Maricopa County Tabulation and Election Center in downtown Phoenix.

articles.author: KENNETH CHANG
articles.title: Watch Rocket Lab Try to Launch an Electron Rocket to Orbit From New Zealand
articles.description: The company aims to complete its first commercial mission to space, a harbinger of a new breed of rocket that is small, cheap and able to be launched frequently.
